= For

[,tsx,title="MyComponent.tsx"]
----
function MyComponent(...) {

    const data = [
        { value: "..." },
        { value: "..." },
    ];

    return (
        <>
            <ul>
                {
                    data.map((item, idx) => {
                        return (
                            <li key={ idx }>{ item.value }</li>
                        )
                    })
                }
            </ul>
        </>
    );
}
----
